headline: Oracle (NYSE:ORCL) Expands Cybersecurity Offering With Ground-Truth On Oracle Cloud Infrastructure
summary: Oracle (NYSE:ORCL) recently announced the deployment of Ground-Truth on its Oracle Cloud Infrastructure, marking a significant enhancement in its cybersecurity offerings. This development likely supports the company's impressive 23% share price increase over the past month. While the broader market saw a modest 4% rise in the last week, Oracle's partnerships, such as those with seQure, IBM, and other entities, added further momentum. These alliances underscore the company's commitment to...

headline: US Warns That Using Huawei AI Chip ‘Anywhere’ Breaks Its Rules
summary: (Bloomberg) -- The Commerce Department issued guidance stating that the use of Huawei Technologies Co.’s Ascend artificial intelligence chips “anywhere in the world” violates the government’s export controls, escalating US efforts to curb technological advances in China. headline: Trump to Rewrite AI Chip Curbs Reviled by Nvidia and US Allies
summary: (Bloomberg) -- The Trump administration plans to overhaul regulations on the export of semiconductors used in artificial intelligence, tossing out a Biden-era approach that had drawn strenuous objections from US allies and companies including Nvidia Corp. and Oracle Corp.Most Read from BloombergAs Coastline Erodes, One California City Considers ‘Retreat Now’A New Central Park Amenity, Tailored to Its East Harlem NeighborsWhat’s Behind the Rise in Serious Injuries on New York City’s Streets?Lawsu

headline: Big Tech commits $80B, ESPN streaming, Microsoft layoffs
summary: Yahoo Finance host Brad Smith tracks today's top moving stocks and biggest market stories in this Market Minute, including funding commitments by tech giants Alphabet (GOOG, GOOGL), Oracle (ORCL), and Salesforce (CRM) to the US and Saudi Arabia; ESPN's standalone streaming service is set to launch this fall; and Microsoft (MSFT) is reportedly cutting 3% of its workforce. Stay up to date on the latest market action, minute-by-minute, with Yahoo Finance's Market Minute.

headline: Oracle Partners With seQure To Bolster Cybersecurity For Governments, Enterprises
summary: Oracle Corporation (NYSE:ORCL), along with seQure, a cybersecurity firm and its partner, disclosed the availability of seQure’s Ground-Truth service on Oracle Cloud Infrastructure (OCI). The company said that Ground-Truth is a cybersecurity and data observability service that helps automate the detection of threats and vulnerabilities and can reduce event alerts by 90%. Previously an on-premises solution, Ground-Truth can now be deployed across Oracle’s various cloud offerings, including public,

headline: Oracle and Entanglement Partner to Deliver Advanced Security to Governments and Enterprises
summary: Oracle and seQure, an Entanglement company and Oracle partner, today announced that governments and enterprises can deploy Ground-Truth on Oracle Cloud Infrastructure (OCI). Ground-Truth is a cybersecurity and data observability service that helps automate the detection of threats and vulnerabilities and can reduce event alerts by 90 percent. Previously only available on-premises, Ground-Truth is now available across Oracle's distributed cloud including public, government, sovereign, and dedicat
